resources.string: The Starting Strength Novice Program can be broken down into two workout days, Day A and Day B. The entire body is worked each session.
The goal of this program is to add weight each and every time you lift. Perform the program on a 3 day per week schedule, on non-consecutive days, i.e. Mon/Wed/Fri, Tues/Thurs/Sat or similar.
For more information, and a demonstrational video, click on any exercise below.
